snippet: Mr. Eisenman enlisted Walker Evans as an instructor and persuaded Steve Jobs to donate early-generation computers to the program.
abstract: Alvin Eisenman, graphic designer who became first director of Yale's pioneering program in the discipline, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Eisenman enlisted Walker Evans as an instructor and persuaded Steve Jobs to donate early-generation computers to the program.

headline.main: Alvin Eisenman, Graphic Design Educator, Dies at 92

keywords.value: Yale School of Art and Architecture
